Direct Known Subclasses:
LimitHoldingsTermIssuerLong, LimitHoldingsTermIssuerLongShort, LimitHoldingsTermIssuerNet, LimitHoldingsTermIssuerShort, LimitHoldingsTermIssuerWeightedAverage
public abstract class LimitHoldingsTermIssuer
extends LimitHoldingsTerm
LimitHoldingsTermIssuer abstracts the Limit Issuer Holdings Constraint Term.

  • Module = Portfolio Core Module
  • Library = Asset Allocation Analytics
  • Project = Portfolio Construction under Allocation Constraints
  • Package = Portfolio Construction Constraint Term Suite
